cu.explanation_en: Setting the AMF IP to an unreachable address will cause NG interface connection failure and prevent AMF communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting Ta4 to [0, 0] creates an invalid timing range where the values are equal and zero, causing front-haul timing misalignment and synchronization errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 Ta4 設定為 [0, 0] 會創建無效的定時範圍，其中值相等且為零，導致前傳定時錯位和同步錯誤。
